mapper.sql: patient_plan_id, plan_num, patient_id,send_type, patient_name, patient_sex, patient_age, patient_phone,patient_ward,form_status, patient_status, patient_condition, patient_diagous, patient_type, area_code, plan_pats_status,rules_info_id, next_date,patient_source,handle_sugges,id_card,inhos_no,opend_id,form_id, patient_ward_id,patient_time,diagous_id,form_record_id
mapper.select:
select
from leanin_plan_patient where patient_status = 1 and patient_plan_id = #{patientPlanId} limit 1

SELECT
FROM leanin_plan_patient WHERE patient_status != 2
and plan_num=#{planNum}
and plan_pats_status between 3 and 11
and plan_pats_status=#{status}
and patient_name like CONCAT('%',#{patientName},'%')
and send_type = 2

SELECT
FROM leanin_plan_patient WHERE patient_status = 1 and patient_id=#{patientId}
SELECT COUNT(patient_id) FROM leanin_plan_patient WHERE plan_num=#{planNum} AND plan_pats_status = 1
SELECT COUNT(patient_id) FROM leanin_plan_patient WHERE plan_num=#{planNum} AND plan_pats_status=2
SELECT COUNT(patient_id) FROM leanin_plan_patient WHERE plan_num=#{planNum} AND plan_pats_status=3
SELECT COUNT(patient_id) FROM leanin_plan_patient WHERE plan_num=#{planNum} AND plan_pats_status=-1
mapper.update: update leanin_plan_patient set plan_pats_status=#{status} where patient_plan_id = #{patientPlanId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
update leanin_plan_patient set patient_status=2 where patient_plan_id = #{patientPlanId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

UPDATE leanin_plan_patient
plan_num = #{planPatientVo.planNum},
patient_id = #{planPatientVo.patientId},
send_type = #{planPatientVo.sendType},
patient_name = #{planPatientVo.patientName},
patient_sex = #{planPatientVo.patientSex},
patient_age = #{planPatientVo.patientAge},
patient_phone = #{planPatientVo.patientPhone},
patient_ward = #{planPatientVo.patientWard},
form_status = #{planPatientVo.formStatus},
patient_status = #{planPatientVo.patientStatus},
patient_condition = #{planPatientVo.patientCondition},
patient_diagous = #{planPatientVo.patientDiagous},
patient_type = #{planPatientVo.patientType},
area_code = #{planPatientVo.areaCode},
plan_pats_status = #{planPatientVo.planPatsStatus},
rules_info_id = #{planPatientVo.rulesInfoId},
next_date = #{planPatientVo.nextDate},
patient_source = #{planPatientVo.patientSource},
handle_sugges = #{planPatientVo.handleSugges},
id_card = #{planPatientVo.idCard},
inhos_no = #{planPatientVo.inhosNo},
form_id = #{planPatientVo.formId},
form_record_id = #{planPatientVo.formRecordId},
where patient_plan_id = #{planPatientVo.patientPlanId}

UPDATE leanin_plan_patient
plan_num = #{planPatientVo.planNum},
patient_id = #{planPatientVo.patientId},
send_type = #{planPatientVo.sendType},
patient_name = #{planPatientVo.patientName},
patient_sex = #{planPatientVo.patientSex},
patient_age = #{planPatientVo.patientAge},
patient_phone = #{planPatientVo.patientPhone},
patient_ward = #{planPatientVo.patientWard},
form_status = #{planPatientVo.formStatus},
patient_status = #{planPatientVo.patientStatus},
patient_condition = #{planPatientVo.patientCondition},
patient_diagous = #{planPatientVo.patientDiagous},
patient_type = #{planPatientVo.patientType},
area_code = #{planPatientVo.areaCode},
plan_pats_status = #{planPatientVo.planPatsStatus},
rules_info_id = #{planPatientVo.rulesInfoId},
next_date = #{planPatientVo.nextDate},
patient_source = #{planPatientVo.patientSource},
handle_sugges = #{planPatientVo.handleSugges},
id_card = #{planPatientVo.idCard},
inhos_no = #{planPatientVo.inhosNo},
form_id = #{planPatientVo.formId},

where patient_plan_id = #{planPatientVo.patientPlanId}
mapper.insert:
insert into leanin_plan_patient
plan_num,
patient_id,
send_type,
patient_name,
patient_sex,
patient_age,
patient_phone,
patient_ward,
form_status,
patient_status,
patient_condition,
patient_diagous,
patient_type,
area_code,
plan_pats_status,
rules_info_id,
next_date,
patient_source,
id_card,
inhos_no,
form_id,

#{patientId},
#{sendType},

mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(lpp.plan_pats_status) c,MONTH(lpp.next_date) m,lpp.plan_pats_status FROM leanin_plan_patient lpp WHERE YEAR(lpp.next_date) = #{time} and lpp.plan_num in ( select lpi.plan_num from leanin_plan_info lpi where lpi.plan_duty_per = #{userId} and lpi.plan_status = 0 and lpi.plan_type =1 ) GROUP BY lpp.plan_pats_status,MONTH(lpp.next_date) ORDER BY MONTH(lpp.next_date) ASC

SELECT lpp.`next_date`, lau.`admin_name`, lpp.`form_id`, lfi.`form_name`, lpi.plan_duty_per, CASE lpp.`form_status` WHEN 1 THEN '未读' WHEN 2 THEN '已读' ELSE '其他' END AS form_status FROM `leanin_plan_patient` lpp, `leanin_plan_info` lpi,`leanin_admin_user` lau,`leanin_form_info` lfi WHERE lpi.`plan_num` = lpp.`plan_num` AND lpp.`patient_status` = 1 AND lpp.`form_id` = lfi.`form_num` AND lpi.`plan_duty_per` = lau.`admin_id` AND lpp.patient_id = #{patientId}
